title: Simple raw tuna ahi with soy sauce and sesame
ingredients: ['4 lean tuna steaks', '5 spring onions, thinly sliced', '2 avocados, stones removed and diced', '120ml soy sauce', '2 tablespoons toasted sesame oil', '2 teaspoons ginger paste or finely grated root ginger', "1 teaspoon 'Lazy Garlic' from a jar, or 3 crushed cloves", 'lime juice to taste', 'fresh or dried coriander, to garnish']
